# LibraryMusicVideoSortProperties

**Protocol**

Music video properties your app uses to sort results for a library request.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol LibraryMusicVideoSortProperties
```

## Instance Properties

- **albumTitle**: The title of the album the music video appears on.
- **artistName**: The artist’s name.
- **duration**: The duration of the music video.
- **lastPlayedDate**: The date when the user last played the music video on this device.
- **libraryAddedDate**: The date when the user added the music video to the library.
- **playCount**: The number of times the user played the music video.
- **title**: The title of the music video.
- **trackNumber**: The music video’s number in the album’s track list.
